0.desc: You steady your nerves and strike the boss directly, dealing { damage

1.desc: You drop your weapon, drawing attention and allowing the next ATTACK to deal {% more damage

2.desc: You tell the others of a new technique, so every ATTACK in the future deals {% more damage

3.desc: Tired and slightly agitated, you take a tea drinking break, giving +{% Class EXP for all characters.

4.desc: You burn their skin, dealing { damage. This exact damage re-triggers each time an ATTACK is chosen.

5.desc: You conjure a friendly spirit, which boosts all damage dealt to boss by %

6.desc: You clamp a cursed ring to their toe, dealing { damage now and each time a BUFF is cast in the future.

7.desc: Dual wielding the next characters weapon, you deal { damage, but the next char can't choose ATTACK.

8.desc: You add extra chilly cheese to everyone's hotdogs outside the fight, giving +{% DMG to all characters

9.desc: You just start randomly grabbing weapons, dealing { damage, but the next 2 chars can't choose ATTACK.

10.desc: You cast a gross but effective fog, increasing all damage by %, but the next char can't choose BUFF.

11.desc: You trip and fall dealing { damage lmao, but the boss's HP gets set to 30% from laughing so hard.

12.desc: You align the energy in the air, so that the next BUFF is 2x more powerful, except for this one. No 4x for you.

13.desc: You create a portal to the 'oof owie' dimension, so that whatever damage hits the boss next is doubled.

14.desc: You notice a trophy on the ground, and run to pick it up instead of attacking.

15.desc: Deal { damage for each previous ATTACK cast. If 3 or more, rewind a character and reset number of casts

16.desc: Boost all damage by {% for each previous BUFF cast. If 3 or more, rewind a character and reset number of casts

17.desc: You reminisce on all the times MISC was cast. If 2 or more, rewind back to 1st character. This only works once.

18.desc: You tell a really freakin' funny joke to your final character, who gets to select an extra turn!

19.desc: You sense weakness and deal a crushing blow of { damage. If boss is under half HP, damage is dealt twice.

20.desc: Punch them into yesteryear, dealing { damage. If 9+ ATTACK casted, rewind to 1st character. Only works once.

21.desc: Summon a blackhole, boosting all damage by %. If 9+ BUFF casted, rewind to 1st character. Only works once.
